full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN PA'I RGYAL PO'I LHO SGO BGEGS SEL NOR BU'I DBANG MDZOD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS KYIS SMAN PA GRVA TSANG GI SLOB DPON MKHAN PO SMAN RAMS PAS 'GRO BA RNAMS KYI NAD SEL BA'I CHED DU RGYAB RTEN DPUNG GROGS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG ,DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR BKA' AI MCHOD PAR DHARMA SVA MIS @017B MKHAN CHEN ZHI BA MTSO'I MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA DANG GZHED BYAS NAS BRIS PAS 'GRO MA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DUG GSUM GYI RGYU 'BRAS NAD LAS MYUR BA NYID DU THAR BA DANG, BDE GSHEGS BRGYAD KYI GO 'PHANG TSE 'DI NYID LA THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,'DI BRIS DGE BAS BDAG DANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYIS, ,BDE GSHEGS BRGYAD KYI GO 'PHANG TSE 'DIR THOB GYUR CIG , ,,)
